title: 15w33c该怎么下载
author: yumishichenyu
txt_content: 一直用盗版，正版的三排完全看不懂，求如何下载！

replies.author: LR孤之雨
replies.txt_content:
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dDlSCBv
下载后直接丢进versions文件夹里面就行

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
你可以在MCLBN下载version文件，复制到你的.minecraft\version中即可
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-119479-1-1.html

replies.author: www2283123
replies.txt_content:
到这里下个BM启动器http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... peid%26typeid%3D908
启动器里面的下载中心有

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 左下角 勾上快照 选快照 保存 play～

replies.author: 屠灵神
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-487052-1-1.html这里有发布的
你只要下载好
然后找个启动器就行了
望采纳~
